name: Little Red Doom Hook
description:
"Little Red Doom Hook" is a platformer game that tells the story of Little Red Riding Hood as she attempts to reach her grandmother's house. Unfortunately, a happy ending is not in store for her, and she must relive the same story over and over again until she finds a way to save herself. To make her way through the treacherous landscape, she must use a grappling hook to swing over dangerous obstacles and navigate the treacherous terrain.

The game explores the theme of "an end is a new beginning" in a unique and challenging way, as players must guide Little Red through increasingly difficult levels with each iteration of the story. As they progress, they will discover new ways to use the grappling hook and hone their platforming skills to overcome the many obstacles in their path.

With a vibrant and colorful art style, atmospheric music, and responsive controls, "Little Red Doom Hook" offers a unique and challenging gaming experience.

Controls:

W A S D - movement
Shift - run
Space - jump
E or RMB - throw the hook
LMB - shoot

Credits:

Music for cutscenes: Vordt of the Boreal Valley (Dark Souls 3) - GaMetal Remix

The rest of the music and sounds are not protected by copyright and were found from open sources.
